trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 创建黑色钢笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle to bound an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和限定椭圆的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the ellipse to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制椭圆。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，它确定曲线的颜色、宽度和样式。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定义椭圆的边框的左上角的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定义椭圆的边框的左上角的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定义椭圆的边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定义椭圆的边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a height, and a width.
trans-unit.target: 绘制一个由边框（该边框由一对坐标、高度和宽度指定）定义的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an ellipse that is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制一个由所描述的边框定义的椭圆`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 创建黑色钢笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle to bound an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和限定椭圆的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the ellipse to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制椭圆。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在指定坐标处绘制由指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 表示的图像。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image on the display surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定显示面上结果图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image contained in the <c>icon</c> parameter is scaled to the dimensions of this rectangular area.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>icon</c> 参数中包含的图像缩放为此矩形区域的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> within the area specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 结构指定的区域内绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 表示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 从标准 Windows 图标文件 SampIcon.ico 示例文件夹中创建的图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中来绘制该图标的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制图标。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the icon on the screen, and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn icon.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置在屏幕上，查找图标，并在该矩形的大小确定绘制的图标的缩放。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在指定坐标处绘制由指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 表示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 从标准 Windows 图标文件 SampIcon.ico 示例文件夹中创建的图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of the upper-left corner at which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 创建在该处来绘制该图标的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制图标。

trans-unit.source: The drawn icon is unscaled.
trans-unit.target: 绘制的图标是不成比例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is not scaled to fit this rectangle, but retains its original size.
trans-unit.target: 不缩放图像以适合此矩形的大小，但保留其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the rectangle, it is clipped to fit inside it.
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像比该矩形大，将它剪裁到适合它的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> without scaling the image.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 表示的图像，而不缩放该图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 从标准 Windows 图标文件 SampIcon.ico 示例文件夹中创建的图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中来绘制该图标的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制图标。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the icon on the screen, and the drawn icon is unscaled and unclipped.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置在屏幕上，查找图标，并不成比例，也未剪裁绘制的图标。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the original size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按原始大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that represents the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构，它表示所绘制图像的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置使用原始物理大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用绘制图像的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该映像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the unscaled image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将不成比例的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定形状和大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 表示的图像`image`缩放和剪切以适应指定的平行四边形的形状参数`destPoints`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的平行四边形的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 平行四边形的位置在屏幕上，查找映像，并原始图像和大小的大小和形状的平行四边形确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置使用原始物理大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用绘制图像的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该映像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置在屏幕上，查找映像，并将原始图像的大小和矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the original size of the image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置在屏幕上，确定图像和图像的原始大小和矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image, using its original physical size, at the location specified by a coordinate pair.
trans-unit.target: 在由坐标对指定的位置，使用图像的原始物理大小绘制指定的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用绘制图像的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。

trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 目标矩形的位置在屏幕上查找映像、 源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小决定原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将图像进行缩放以适合该矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 目标矩形的位置在屏幕上查找映像、 源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小决定原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the`image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的平行四边形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形绘制到像素的单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，位置在屏幕上，确定图像和矩形和大小的大小和形状的平行四边形确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义要绘制图像在其中一个目标平行四边形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。

trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 对于原始、 未调整目标平行四边形，位置定位上屏幕、 源矩形的大小和大小的映像并目标平行四边形的形状确定的缩放和剪切所绘制的图像，和的大小矩形确定原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置绘制图像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，像素宽度为 360、 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有的物理宽度为 5 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制的图像使用的物理大小，因此图像部分将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设绘制图像部分的像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像部分，呈现的图像部分的像素宽度将 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 源矩形的大小确定未缩放的原始图像的哪些部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制的图像使用的物理大小，因此图像部分将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设绘制图像部分的像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像部分，呈现的图像部分的像素宽度将 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 源矩形的大小确定未缩放的原始图像的哪些部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Width of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制图像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle defined by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters determines the position and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 由定义的矩形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数确定的位置和所绘制图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和在其中绘制图像的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置在屏幕上，查找映像，并将原始图像的大小和矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托，它指定在绘制图像期间要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> 方法的执行。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载`callback`参数提供了一种根据条件由应用程序开始后停止的绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制的大图像，用户可能滚动到屏幕外，用例的应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 代码首先定义回调方法以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委托; 定义简单，只是测试以了解是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 主正文中的示例执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method:
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调方法：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的平行四边形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形绘制到像素的单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，位置在屏幕上，确定图像和矩形和大小的大小和形状的平行四边形确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `true`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image.
trans-unit.target: 由于本示例使用的重载，不能通过`callBackData`参数，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调返回`true`，这将导致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法结束时，和的示例中包含的异常处理代码将输出异常文本而不是绘制图像。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载`callback`和`callbackData`参数提供了一种根据条件和由应用程序的数据开始后停止的绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制的大图像，用户可能滚动到屏幕外，用例的应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 代码首先定义回调方法以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委托; 定义简单，只是测试以了解是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 主正文中的示例执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的平行四边形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形绘制到像素的单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，位置在屏幕上，确定图像和矩形和大小的大小和形状的平行四边形确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 由于本示例使用的重载，将传递`callBackData`参数，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调返回`false`，这将导致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法若要继续，以及的示例将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象中要绘制的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数所用的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托，它指定在绘制图像期间要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> 方法的执行。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying additional data for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate to use when checking whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，它为 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托指定在检查是否停止执行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> 方法时要使用的附加数据。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将图像进行缩放以适合该矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Width of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的高度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used to determine the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定用于确定源矩形的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 目标矩形的位置在屏幕上，确定图像的源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小决定原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要从中提取部分图像的源矩形的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置源矩形的度量的单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 原始、 未调整目标矩形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小决定的哪些部分原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将图像进行缩放以适合该矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Width of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的高度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used to determine the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定用于确定源矩形的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`参数。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托，它指定在绘制图像期间要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> 方法的执行。

trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`对象。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载`callback`参数提供了一种根据条件由应用程序开始后停止的绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制的大图像，用户可能滚动到屏幕外，用例的应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 代码首先定义回调方法以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委托; 定义简单，只是测试以了解是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 主正文中的示例执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的目标矩形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建源矩形来选择要绘制的图像的部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形绘制到像素的单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 原始、 未调整目标矩形的位置在屏幕上，确定图像和源矩形和大小的大小和目标矩形形状确定所绘制图像的缩放。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `true`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image.
trans-unit.target: 由于本示例使用的重载，不能通过`callBackData`参数，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调返回`true`，这将导致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法结束时，和的示例中包含的异常处理代码将输出异常文本而不是绘制图像。

trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的源图像部分的高度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used to determine the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定用于确定源矩形的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定 <c>image</c> 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托，它指定在绘制图像期间要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.IntPtr)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.IntPtr)" /> 方法的执行。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying additional data for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate to use when checking whether to stop execution of the <see langword="DrawImage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，它为 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委托指定在检查是否停止执行 <see langword="DrawImage" /> 方法时要使用的附加数据。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`要绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此部分进行缩放以容纳在由指定的矩形内`destRect`参数。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载`callback`和`callbackData`参数提供了一种根据条件和由应用程序的数据开始后停止的绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制的大图像，用户可能滚动到屏幕外，用例的应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 代码首先定义回调方法以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委托; 定义简单，只是测试以了解是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 主正文中的示例执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义在其中绘制图像的目标矩形的点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建源矩形来选择要绘制的图像的部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 设置图形绘制到像素的单位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 创建和设置的调整后的映像，以便具有更大比常用伽玛值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 原始、 未调整目标矩形的位置在屏幕上，确定图像和源矩形和大小的大小和目标矩形形状确定所绘制图像的缩放。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 由于本示例使用的重载，将传递`callBackData`参数，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回调返回`false`，这将导致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法若要继续，以及的示例将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image using its original physical size at the location specified by a coordinate pair.
trans-unit.target: 在由坐标对指定的位置，使用图像的原始物理大小绘制指定的图像。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置使用图像的原始物理大小绘制指定的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 从 JPEG 文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例的文件夹中创建的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the entire image using its physical size.
trans-unit.target: 绘制整个图像使用的物理大小。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.target: 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the entire image using its physical size.
trans-unit.target: 绘制整个图像使用的物理大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置使用图像的原始物理大小绘制指定的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储像素宽度的值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的测量单位是映像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，带有像素宽度为 216 和 72 每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 3 英寸。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 此说明同样适用于像素高度和物理高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设映像具有像素宽度为 216 和水平分辨率为每英寸点数为 72。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>分辨率为每英寸 96 点的设备上绘制该图像，则在呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中绘制图像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image without scaling and clips it, if necessary, to fit in the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在不进行缩放的情况下绘制指定的图像，并在需要时剪辑该图像以适合指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawImageUnscaled` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawImageUnscaled`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
