trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a coordinate pair, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 绘制一个扇形，该形状由一个坐标对、宽度、高度以及两条射线所指定的椭圆定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，它确定扇形的颜色、宽度和样式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它表示定义该扇形所属的椭圆的边框。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 从 x 轴到扇形的第一条边沿顺时针方向度量的角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 从 <c>startAngle</c> 参数到扇形的第二条边沿顺时针方向度量的角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构和两条射线所指定的椭圆定义的扇形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制由一个椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点定义的扇形。椭圆的边框由定义。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.

trans-unit.target: 从 <c>startAngle</c> 参数到扇形的第二条边沿顺时针方向度量的角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.target: 边框的高度，该边框定义扇形所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制由一个椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点定义的扇形。椭圆的边框所描述由定义`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 创建黑色钢笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和限定整个椭圆的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由一组 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构定义的多边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，它确定多边形的颜色、宽度和样式。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represent the vertices of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组，这些结构表示多边形的顶点。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由一组 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构定义的多边形。

trans-unit.source: Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的两个连续点的每对指定多边形的边。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果最后一个点和数组的第一个点时间不一致，它们指定多边形最后一条边。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle specified by a coordinate pair, a width, and a height.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由坐标对、宽度和高度指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a text string to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建要绘制的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Defines the font as Arial (16pt).
trans-unit.target: 定义为 Arial （16 磅） 的字体。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid, black brush to draw with.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的黑色画笔绘制所使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point for the upper-left corner at which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于绘制文本的左上角的点。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, and destination point.
trans-unit.target: 使用的字体、 画笔和目标点向屏幕绘制字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，它定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the color and texture of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />，它确定所绘制文本的颜色和纹理。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the location of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制文本的位置。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text string in the specified rectangle with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在指定矩形并且用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 对象绘制指定的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的文本`s`所表示的矩形内绘制参数`layoutRectangle`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本不适合该矩形内，则将在最接近的单词被截断。

trans-unit.source: To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> overload that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 若要进一步操作如何字符串绘制在矩形使用内部<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>采用重载<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制文本的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> that specifies formatting attributes, such as line spacing and alignment, that are applied to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />，它指定应用于所绘制文本的格式化特性（如行距和对齐方式）。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text string at the specified location with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> objects using the formatting attributes of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> 的格式化特性，用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 对象在指定的位置绘制指定的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a text string to draw.
trans-unit.target: 创建要绘制的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Defines the font as Arial (16pt).
trans-unit.target: 定义为 Arial （16 磅） 的字体。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid, black brush to draw with.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的黑色画笔绘制所使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of a point for the upper-left corner at which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个点，将在该处绘制文本的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format of the string to draw vertically
trans-unit.target: 设置要垂直绘制的字符串的格式

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, destination point, and format.
trans-unit.target: 使用字体、 画笔、 目标点和格式向屏幕绘制字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer" /> that represents the container this method restores.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer" />，它表示此方法还原的容器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current graphics container and restores the state of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the state saved by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前图形容器，并将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的状态还原到通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer" /> 方法保存的状态。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法与<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法来创建嵌套的 graphics 容器。

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 图形容器保留图形状态，例如转换、 剪辑区域和呈现属性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保存的状态信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放置在堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>标识该信息块。

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 当你标识对象传递给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，该信息块从堆栈中移除，并用于还原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到它所处的时间中的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以嵌套容器;也就是说，可以调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用之前多次<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，信息块放在堆栈，并且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>信息块。

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 传递时，这些对象附加到之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>返回到它所处的时间中的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用返回了该特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 信息块将位于堆栈上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中，删除方法调用和所有信息块后，该堆栈上都放置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用也将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法相同为对调用堆栈上的位置信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container.
trans-unit.target: 打开新的图形容器和保存旧的容器。

trans-unit.source: Translates the world coordinates in the container.
trans-unit.target: 将容器中的通用坐标。

trans-unit.source: Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container.
trans-unit.target: 在填充红色矩形 (转换的坐标) 新的容器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the new container and restores the saved container.
trans-unit.target: 关闭新的容器，并将还原保存的容器。

trans-unit.source: Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container.
trans-unit.target: 填充的绿色矩形 （未转换的坐标中） 的已保存的容器。

trans-unit.source: The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size.
trans-unit.target: 结果是覆盖相同大小的红色矩形之上一个绿色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的点处显示。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的点处显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a form that has a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> as one of its private members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建具有的窗体<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>作为其私有成员之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A>, which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A>，从而调用窗体的`MetafileCallback`图元文件中每个记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `MetafileCallback` method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `MetafileCallback` 方法调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an <xref:System.IntPtr>, but the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method expects the record data to be a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，`MetafileCallback`方法接收记录数据作为<xref:System.IntPtr>，但<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法要求以是字节数组记录数据。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy%2A> copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy%2A>将记录数据复制到的字节数组，以便它可以传递给<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的点处显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的矩形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的点处用指定的图像特性显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的点处显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的平行四边形中用指定的图像特性显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`参数替换指定何时写入图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`参数替换指定何时写入图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structures that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的矩形中用指定的图像特性显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的点处显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.

trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的点处用指定的图像特性显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 由三个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的平行四边形中用指定的图像特性显示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，指定`callback`参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 这三种<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构表示平行四边形的左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四个点推断出以形成一个平行四边形的前三个。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`参数替换指定何时写入图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构，它指定所绘制图元文件的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它相对于图元文件的左上角指定要绘制的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 枚举的成员，它指定度量单位，该度量单位用于确定 <c>srcRect</c> 参数指定的矩形所包含的部分图元文件。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

trans-unit.target: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以为此参数传递 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该回调方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>到"播放"，或绘图，记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的回调方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必须这样做调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法特定的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在枚举。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何绘制发生在由指定的矩形外部`srcRect`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`参数替换指定何时写入图元文件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to exclude the area specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域，以排除 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构所指定的区域。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the rectangle to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它指定要从剪辑区域排除的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to exclude the area specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域，以排除 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构所指定的区域。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法排除指定的区域`rect`从为当前剪辑区域的参数并将分配到结果区域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100).
trans-unit.target: 创建 100 像素 x 100 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （100，100）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region defined by the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建定义矩形的区域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: 设置要排除的矩形区域的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: X 300 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （0，0） 与纯蓝色画笔填充 300 像素。

trans-unit.source: The result is a blue rectangle with a square region toward its lower-right corner missing.
trans-unit.target: 结果是一个具有其右下角方向缺少一个正方形区域的蓝色矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> that specifies the region to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />，它指定要从剪辑区域排除的区域。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to exclude the area specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域，以排除 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 所指定的区域。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `region` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法排除指定的区域`region`从为当前剪辑区域的参数并将分配到结果区域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100).
trans-unit.target: 创建 100 像素 x 100 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （100，100）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 设置以排除该矩形的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: X 300 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （0，0） 与纯蓝色画笔填充 300 像素。

trans-unit.source: The result is a blue rectangle with a square area toward its lower-right corner missing.
trans-unit.target: 结果是其右下角方向缺少一个正方形区域一个蓝色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.source: Fills the curve on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充屏幕上的曲线。

trans-unit.source: The curve has a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 曲线的默认张力 0.5。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的红色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of four points to define a spline.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个数组的四个点定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fill mode to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode.Winding>.
trans-unit.target: 将填充模式设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode.Winding>。

trans-unit.source: Fills the curve on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充屏幕上的曲线。

trans-unit.source: The curve has a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 曲线的默认张力 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="points" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode" /> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode" /> 枚举的成员，它确定填充曲线的方式。

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 大于或等于 0.0F 的值，该值指定曲线的张力。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures using the specified fill mode and tension.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的填充模式和张力填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`参数确定样条的形状。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`参数为 0.0 f 时，此方法用于绘制直线段连接的点。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，`tension`参数是否小于或等于 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 通过 1.0 f 的值不会生成不寻常的结果。
