trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode" /> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode" /> 枚举的成员，它确定填充曲线的方式。

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 大于或等于 0.0F 的值，该值指定曲线的张力。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures using the specified fill mode and tension.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的填充模式和张力填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`参数确定样条的形状。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`参数为 0.0 f 时，此方法用于绘制直线段连接的点。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，`tension`参数是否小于或等于 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 通过 1.0 f 的值不会生成不寻常的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的红色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of four points to define a spline.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个数组的四个点定义样条。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fill mode to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode.Winding>.
trans-unit.target: 将填充模式设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode.Winding>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tension to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 将张力设置为 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Fills the curve on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充屏幕上的曲线。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="points" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, and a height.
trans-unit.target: 填充边框所定义的椭圆的内部，该边框由一对坐标、一个宽度和一个高度指定。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它表示定义椭圆的边框。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构指定的边框所定义的椭圆的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of an ellipse with a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充的椭圆的内部<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle represented by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆定义的边界矩形表示`rect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的红色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates the location and size of a rectangle that bounds an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和限定椭圆的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.target: 填充在屏幕上的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that represents the path to fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />，它表示要填充的路径。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 的内部。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> consists of a series of line and curve segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>由一系列的直线和曲线的段组成。

trans-unit.source: If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径由表示`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合路径和第一个点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的红色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path object.
trans-unit.target: 创建图形路径对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an ellipse to the graphics path.
trans-unit.target: 向图形路径中添加一个椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Fills the path on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充屏幕上的路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填充由一对坐标、一个宽度、一个高度以及两条射线指定的椭圆所定义的扇形区的内部。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它表示定义该扇形区所属的椭圆的边框。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从 x 轴沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第一个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从 <c>startAngle</c> 参数沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第二个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填充椭圆所定义的扇形区的内部，该椭圆由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构和两条射线指定。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点所定义的扇形区的内部。椭圆的边框由定义。

trans-unit.source: The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形区包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充椭圆在屏幕上的饼形区域。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框左上角的 x 坐标，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框左上角的 y 坐标，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框的宽度，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框的高度，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.target: 从 x 轴沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第一个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从 <c>startAngle</c> 参数沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第二个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填充由一对坐标、一个宽度、一个高度以及两条射线指定的椭圆所定义的扇形区的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点所定义的扇形区的内部。椭圆的边框由定义。

trans-unit.source: The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形区包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充椭圆在屏幕上的饼形区域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框左上角的 x 坐标，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框左上角的 y 坐标，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框的宽度，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 边框的高度，该边框定义扇形区所属的椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从 x 轴沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第一个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从 <c>startAngle</c> 参数沿顺时针方向旋转到扇形区第二个边所测得的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填充由一对坐标、一个宽度、一个高度以及两条射线指定的椭圆所定义的扇形区的内部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点所定义的扇形区的内部。椭圆的边框由定义。

trans-unit.source: The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形区包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心的红色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates the location and size of a rectangle that bounds an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 创建的位置和限定椭圆的矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction).
trans-unit.target: 定义 （相对于 x 轴） 的开始角度和扫描角度 （不管是在顺时针方向）。

trans-unit.source: Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充椭圆在屏幕上的饼形区域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构指定的点数组所定义的多边形的内部。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represent the vertices of the polygon to fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构数组，这些结构表示要填充的多边形的顶点。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构指定的点数组所定义的多边形的内部。

trans-unit.source: Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 每个数组中的两个连续点指定多边形的边。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果最后一个点和第一个点时间不一致，它们将指定多边形的右的端。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represent the vertices of the polygon to fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构数组，这些结构表示要填充的多边形的顶点。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构指定的点数组所定义的多边形的内部。

trans-unit.source: Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interiors of a series of rectangles specified by <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构指定的一系列矩形的内部。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures that represent the rectangles to fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构数组，这些结构表示要填充的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interiors of a series of rectangles specified by <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构指定的一系列矩形的内部。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建纯蓝色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of three rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 创建三个矩形的数组。

trans-unit.source: Fills the three rectangular areas on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充在屏幕上的三个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rects" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rects" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rects" /> is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rects" /> 是一个长度为零的数组。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structures that represent the rectangles to fill.

trans-unit.target: 填充由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构指定的一系列矩形的内部。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid blue brush.

trans-unit.target: 创建三个矩形的数组。

trans-unit.target: 填充在屏幕上的三个矩形区域。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rects" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="Rects" /> is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="Rects" /> 是一个长度为零的数组。

trans-unit.target: 确定填充特性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> that represents the area to fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />，它表示要填充的区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 填充 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的内部。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Region> is composed of rectangles and paths.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Region>由组成矩形和路径。

trans-unit.source: If the region is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果区域未关闭，添加额外的线段在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 创建纯蓝色画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the rectangular region on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 填充在屏幕上的矩形区域。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations and returns immediately without waiting for the operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 强制执行所有挂起的图形操作并立即返回而不等待操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations and returns immediately without waiting for the operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 强制执行所有挂起的图形操作并立即返回而不等待操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a flush and returns immediately without waiting for any currently executing graphics operation to finish.
trans-unit.target: 此方法开始刷新，并立即返回，而不必等待任何当前正在执行的图形操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention" /> enumeration that specifies whether the method returns immediately or waits for any existing operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention" /> 枚举的成员，它指定该方法是立即返回还是等待所有现有的操作都完成。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations with the method waiting or not waiting, as specified, to return before the operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 用此方法强制执行所有挂起的图形操作，按照指定，等待或者不等待，在操作完成之前返回。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention.Flush> for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention.Sync> specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention.Flush>为`intention`参数指定该方法返回在开始刷新，而值后立即<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention.Sync>指定，该方法在返回之前一直等到所有现有的操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from the specified handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 从设备上下文的指定句柄创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from the specified handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 从设备上下文的指定句柄创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为指定的设备上下文返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关资源创建的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.
trans-unit.target: 即使显示设备具有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不将默认使用该配置文件。

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，构造<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从 HDC 后 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 传递给`SetICMMode`函数。

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过任何绘图<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>将根据关联到显示设备的 ICM 配置文件调整。

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 启用 ICM 将导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A> can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 调用时的设备上下文 （映射模式、 逻辑单元，以及类似的） 的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A>可能会影响呈现通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets it to the handle to the device context of the graphics object of the form.
trans-unit.target: 创建了一个内部指针类型变量`hdc`并将它设置为窗体的图形对象的设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new graphics object using `hdc`.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的图形对象使用`hdc`。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle with the new graphics object (on the screen).
trans-unit.target: （在屏幕） 绘制一个具有新的图形对象的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Releases the new graphics object using `hdc`.
trans-unit.target: 释放新的图形对象使用`hdc`。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device.
trans-unit.target: 设备的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from the specified handle to a device context and handle to a device.
trans-unit.target: 从设备上下文的指定句柄和设备的句柄创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified device context and device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为指定的设备上下文和设备返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关资源创建的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.
trans-unit.target: 即使显示设备具有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不将默认使用该配置文件。

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，构造<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从 HDC 后 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 传递给`SetICMMode`函数。

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过任何绘图<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>将根据关联到显示设备的 ICM 配置文件调整。

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 启用 ICM 将导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A> can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 调用时的设备上下文 （映射模式、 逻辑单元，以及类似的） 的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHdc%2A>可能会影响呈现通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: The device handle is typically used to query specific printer capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 查询特定打印机功能通常用于设备句柄。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相关枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定设备上下文的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: 指定设备上下文的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from the specified handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 从窗口的指定句柄创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified window handle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为指定的窗口句柄返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHwnd%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关资源创建的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromHwnd%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler, as well as `thisForm`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> for the example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序，以及`thisForm`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>示例。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a new internal pointer variable `hwnd` and sets it to the handle of the example's form.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的内部指针变量`hwnd`并将它设置为示例的窗体的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from the handle.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the new <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> using a red pen.
trans-unit.target: 向新绘制一个矩形<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>使用红色钢笔。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the new <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 释放新<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相关枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定 Windows 句柄的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified window handle.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口句柄的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from which to create the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format."
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像索引的像素格式，此方法将引发异常，消息，"图形对象无法创建从映像具有索引的像素格式。"

trans-unit.source: The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中显示的索引的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: You can save the indexed image as another format by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29> method and then retrieve a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for the new image.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用索引的图像保存为另一种格式<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29>方法，然后检索<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>新映像的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像任一以下的像素格式，则此方法还会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关资源创建的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> from a graphics file SampImag.jpg in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Image>从一种图形文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同的示例文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: Alters the image by filling a rectangle within it.
trans-unit.target: 通过填充其中的一个矩形来改变该图像。

trans-unit.source: Draws the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 绘制<xref:System.Drawing.Image>到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Releases the created <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 释放创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> has an indexed pixel format or its format is undefined.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 具有索引像素格式，或者格式未定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: 获取累积的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示累积的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: The return value is an object array where the first element contains the cumulative clip region and the second element contains the cumulative translate/transform matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个对象数组，其中的第一个元素包含累积的剪辑区域，第二个元素包含累积平移/变换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the current Windows halftone palette.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 Windows 的半色调调色板的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that specifies the handle to the palette.
trans-unit.target: 指定调色板的句柄的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHalftonePalette%2A> method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 用途<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHalftonePalette%2A>方法是使[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]当显示使用每个像素的 8 位时产生更好的质量半色调。

trans-unit.source: To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示使用半色调调色板的映像，请使用以下过程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Defines interoperability <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> attributes for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll, which contains the necessary [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 定义互操作性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>Windows DLL 文件 gdi32.dll，其中包含所需的属性[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。

trans-unit.source: Defines the `SelectPalette` and `RealizePalette` functions in that DLL as external.
trans-unit.target: 定义`SelectPalette`和`RealizePalette`，即外部该 DLL 中的函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from an existing image file SampImag.jpg (which must be in the same folder as the example code file) and draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 从现有的图像文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同 （它必须是在与示例代码文件相同的文件夹中） 创建的映像并将图像绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates internal pointer type variables and sets their values to the handle to the graphics object and to the current Windows halftone palette, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 创建内部指针类型变量，并将其值分别设置为图形对象与当前 Windows 的半色调调色板的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Selects and realizes the halftone palette.
trans-unit.target: 选择和实现半色调调色板。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new graphics object using the `hdc` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的图形对象使用`hdc`参数。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image again.
trans-unit.target: 重新绘制的图像。

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle to the device context.
trans-unit.target: 释放设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The result is two renderings of the sample image: one with the 16-bit palette and one with the 8-bit palette.
trans-unit.target: 结果是示例图像的两种呈现形式： 一种具有 16 位调色板，另一个使用 8 位调色板。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Handle to the device context associated with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文是基于 Windows 结构[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，它定义一组的图形对象和其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns that device context with the exception of a font.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一种字体除了该设备上下文。

trans-unit.source: Because a font is not selected, calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A> method using a handle returned from the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> method will fail.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有选中一种字体，调用<xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A>方法使用从返回的句柄<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法必须成对出现。

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 期间的作用域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法对，您通常仅对进行调用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 调用在该范围内到[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>生成`hdc`参数因`ObjectBusy`错误。

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]忽略对所做的任何状态更改<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的`hdc`在后续操作中的参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例说明了调用 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数来执行相同的任务[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Defines the interoperability <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll.
trans-unit.target: 定义互操作性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>Windows DLL 文件 gdi32.dll 的属性。

trans-unit.source: This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function.
trans-unit.target: 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。

trans-unit.source: Defines the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> function in that DLL as external.
trans-unit.target: 定义<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>，即外部该 DLL 中的函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a red pen.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个红色的笔。

trans-unit.source: With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用笔，向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form.
trans-unit.target: 定义了一个内部指针类型变量`hdc`并将其值设置为窗体的设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> function.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>函数。

trans-unit.source: Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 释放所表示的设备上下文`hdc`参数。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相关枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure for which to find a match.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 结构，为其查找匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the nearest color to the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 结构最接近的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the nearest color to the one specified with the <paramref name="color" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 结构，它表示与 <paramref name="color" /> 参数指定的颜色最接近的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an arbitrary color with ARGB coordinates (255, 165, 63, 136).
trans-unit.target: 使用 ARGB 坐标 （255，165、 63，136） 创建一个任意颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid brush and sets its color to the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 创建实心画笔，并将其颜色设置为指定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Fills an ellipse using the arbitrary color.
trans-unit.target: 填充椭圆使用任意的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second color and sets its value to the nearest system ARGB color.
trans-unit.target: 创建第二种颜色，并将其值设置为最接近的系统 ARGB 颜色。

trans-unit.source: Fills a second ellipse with this color.
trans-unit.target: 用此颜色填充第二个椭圆。

trans-unit.source: The result is two ellipses: the first drawn with the arbitrary specified color and the second drawn with the system color nearest the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 结果是两个椭圆： 第一个用任意指定的颜色和第二个绘制最接近的指定颜色的系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 关联的插补模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation mode determines how intermediate values between two endpoints are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 内插模式确定如何中间值之间两个终结点进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域更新为当前剪辑区域与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构的交集。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: 与当前剪辑区域相交的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域更新为当前剪辑区域与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构的交集。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示为当前剪辑区域与由指定的矩形的交集的区域`rect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形的左上角，位于 （0，0） 和剪辑区域设置到此矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形的左上角，位于 （100，100） 和剪辑区域设置将此矩形交集的当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 填充包括纯蓝色画笔与前的两个矩形大矩形。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clipping region to infinite.
trans-unit.target: 将的剪辑区域重置为无限。

trans-unit.source: Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制的矩形。

trans-unit.source: It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region.
trans-unit.target: 它使用黑色钢笔的第一个剪辑矩形和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue.
trans-unit.target: 结果是仅两个矩形交集用蓝色填充。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: 与当前剪辑区域相交的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域更新为当前剪辑区域与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构的交集。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示为当前剪辑区域与由指定的矩形的交集的区域`rect`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形的左上角，位于 （0，0） 和剪辑区域设置到此矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形的左上角，位于 （100，100） 和剪辑区域设置将此矩形交集的当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 填充包括纯蓝色画笔与前的两个矩形大矩形。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clipping region to infinite.
trans-unit.target: 将的剪辑区域重置为无限。

trans-unit.source: Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制的矩形。

trans-unit.source: It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region.
trans-unit.target: 它使用黑色钢笔的第一个剪辑矩形和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue.
trans-unit.target: 结果是仅两个矩形交集用蓝色填充。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to intersect with the current region.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前区域交叉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 对象的剪辑区域更新为当前剪辑区域与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的交集。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示为当前剪辑区域与指定的区域的交集的区域`region`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形的左上角，位于 （0，0）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region and sets it to the rectangle, and sets the clipping region to this region.
trans-unit.target: 创建区域并将其设置为矩形，并将的剪辑区域设置为此区域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100).
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形的左上角，位于 （100，100）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region and sets it to the second rectangle, and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this region and the current clipping region (the first rectangle) using a combine mode of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>.
trans-unit.target: 创建区域并将其设置为第二个矩形的剪辑区域设置的此区域与当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形） 使用的组合模式的交集<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>。

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous regions with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 填充包含前两个用纯蓝色画笔大矩形。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clipping region to infinite.
trans-unit.target: 将的剪辑区域重置为无限。

trans-unit.source: Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制的矩形。

trans-unit.source: It uses a black pen for the first clipping region and a red pen for the second clipping region.
trans-unit.target: 它使用黑色钢笔的第一个剪辑区域和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: The result is that only the intersection of the two regions is filled with blue.
trans-unit.target: 结果是仅两个区域的交集用蓝色填充。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域是否为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域为空，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the point specified by a pair of coordinates is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 指示由一对坐标指定的点是否包含在此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可见剪辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要测试其可见性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>.
trans-unit.target: 创建矩形的剪辑区域，并将其设置为窗体使用的图形对象的剪辑区域<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>。

trans-unit.source: Creates two points, one inside the clipping region and one outside.
trans-unit.target: 创建两个点，一个的剪辑区域内，一个外部。

trans-unit.source: Tests each of the points for visibility and draws only the visible one.
trans-unit.target: 测试每个可见性的点，并绘制只有可见的一个。

trans-unit.source: The result is one small red circle, which is within the clip region.
trans-unit.target: 结果是一个小红色圆圈，是的剪辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要测试其可见性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构是否包含在此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可见剪辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the point specified by the <paramref name="point" /> parameter is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="point" /> 参数指定的点包含在此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可见剪辑区域内，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>.
trans-unit.target: 创建矩形的剪辑区域，并将其设置为窗体使用的图形对象的剪辑区域<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>。

trans-unit.target: 创建位置和大小的两个矩形，一个的剪辑区域内，一个外部。

trans-unit.target: 可见性的矩形的每个测试，并绘制只有可见的一个。

trans-unit.source: The result is one small red rectangle, which is within the clip region.
trans-unit.target: 结果是一个小红色矩形，是的剪辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the visible clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可见剪辑区域是否为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the visible portion of the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的剪辑区域的可见部分为空，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this `Graphics` and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: 可见剪辑区域是此的剪辑区域的交集`Graphics`和窗口的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，它定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the layout rectangle for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它指定字符串的布局矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />，它表示字符串的格式化信息（如行距）。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 对象的数组，其中每个对象将字符位置的范围限定在指定字符串内。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 对象的数组，其中每个对象将字符位置的范围限定在指定字符串内。

trans-unit.source: The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的区域与分辨率有关，因此，如果字符串是一种解决方法在图元文件中记录和更高版本播放不同的分辨率可能会略有下降的准确性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point).
trans-unit.target: 设置"第一个和第二个范围"的一个字符串和字符串 ("Times New Roman"，16 点) 的显示字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second").
trans-unit.target: 设置两个字符在字符串中的范围 （与相对应的单词"First"和"第二个"）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to display the string.
trans-unit.target: 创建在其中显示字符串的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式的字符串包括两个字符范围。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges.
trans-unit.target: 测量的字符范围，将确定绑定的两个指定的范围的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the two rectangles to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 向屏幕绘制两个矩形。

trans-unit.source: The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 结果是与第一个范围 （"第一次"） 受红色矩形 （"第二个"） 受蓝色矩形，第二个范围的显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 绘制的指定字符串。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，它定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 绘制的指定字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified by the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 结构，该结构表示 <paramref name="text" /> 参数指定的、使用 <paramref name="font" /> 参数绘制的字符串的大小，单位由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 属性指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示不是报告的窄字符串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，确保<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>为<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure.
trans-unit.target: 创建要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 font 对象并将其设置为 Arial （16 磅）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 创建对大小对象对象并使用它和字体对象来度量字符串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 绘制一个红色矩形使用测得字符串大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制绘制的矩形内的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 结构，它指定文本的最大布局区域。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> within the specified layout area.
trans-unit.target: 当在指定的布局区域内以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 绘制时，测量指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified by the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 结构，该结构表示 <paramref name="text" /> 参数指定的、使用 <paramref name="font" /> 参数绘制的字符串的大小，单位由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 属性指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示不是报告的窄字符串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，确保<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>为<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point).
trans-unit.target: 创建要测量的字符串和字体对象设置为 Arial （16 点）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum layout size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 设置字符串的最大布局大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum layout size to measure the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个大小对象并使用它、 字体对象和最大布局大小来测量字符串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 绘制一个红色矩形使用测得字符串大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制绘制的矩形内的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，它定义字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Maximum width of the string in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的最大宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 绘制的指定字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified in the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 结构，该结构表示在 <paramref name="text" /> 参数中指定的、使用 <paramref name="font" /> 参数绘制的字符串的大小，单位由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 属性指定。

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: `width`参数指定的宽度组件返回的最大值<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>结构 (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width.
trans-unit.target: 如果`width`参数是字符串，将返回的实际宽度小于<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>组件截断为表示的最大适合指定的宽度的字符数的值。

trans-unit.source: To accommodate the entire string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap.
trans-unit.target: 可容纳整个字符串，返回的<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>组件将会调整为一个值，允许显示使用字符换行字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示不是报告的窄字符串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，确保<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>为<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point).

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the upper-left corner of the string.
